questions.question: SkullSpace originally shared space (at 125 Adelaide) with this makerspace.
In 2013, over 15 SkullSpace members pooled together over $1000 to buy this contraption.
This was Ron's single furnishing demand for SkullSpace (which we still have!).
This was the original membership fee for SkullSpace.
This hackerspace pattern, mentioned by Andrew at our first conference appearance, ended up derailing the entire talk.
